name: VR Interior Designer Pro
description: Through use of the HTC Vive, VR Interior Designer Pro allows you to custom design your own Penthouse room with unique furnishings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 -3770K CPU @ 4.00GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980ti or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: yes Additional Notes: HTC Vive Headset Package
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 -3770K CPU @ 4.00GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980ti or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: yes Additional Notes: HTC Vive Headset Package
